about_the_game:
Due to an unexpected crisis at work, Anna and her husband Josef are in desperate need of help. As the player, you can assist Anna by helping her rise to fame on Starmaker, a platform for adult models.

Take on the roles of photographer, lover, and more as you navigate through the challenges and opportunities of Peak City.

A Starmaker Story

Your choices matter. Depending on your dialogue selections, Anna can become more reserved or embrace her wild side. Side characters each have their own questlines with branching narratives, which occasionally intertwine, adding depth to your adventure.

A Vibrant World

Peak City is brimming with intriguing characters. From a seductive, cold, and calculating doctor to a lonely suburban mom yearning for a bit of love, it’s up to you to decide whom to approach or turn away.

  • Anna – Shy, nurturing MILF turned secret Starmaker model.

  • Samantha – Aggressive ex-gamer, protective mom, flirtatious history with Adrian.

  • Katarina – Ambitious, elegant, and manipulative.

  • Sofia – Determined Latina cop, fighting corruption, struggles personally.

  • Tasha – Edgy, rocker comic nerd, owns a game store, fiercely independent.

  • Charlotte – Flirtatious yacht seller, Anna’s manipulative best friend.

  • Nurse Nina – Cheerful but volatile nurse, fiercely caring.

  • Doctor Evelyn Frost – Cold, clinical, unorthodox doctor.

  • Alice – Fun, teasing goth girl, loves clubbing.

  • Phoenix – Strong, loud gym girl, friendly but intimidating.

  • And more...

Lots of Minigames

From an intense Tower Defense challenge to an exhilarating Demon Hunting experience, Starmaker Story diversifies its gameplay with a wide array of engaging side content.

content_descriptors.notes: Starmaker Story is an eroge with explicit sexual content intended for adults only. The game features consensual sex scenes between the Player and NPCs.

name: Starmaker Story

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-7700K CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: In Starmaker Story, an immersive visual novel, you guide Anna as she builds her Starmaker Page and pursues fame, all while discovering your own path and encountering fascinating characters in the vibrant world of Peakcity.
